isis.stitle: VT-365 Diesel Engine Diagnostics (2002) - ENGINE AND VEHICLE FEATURES - Standard Features - Service Diagnostics

svcproc.title: Service Diagnostics
svcproc.para: The Electronic Service Tool (EST) provides diagnostic information using the ATA datalink. The recommended EST is the EZ Tech™ with Master Diagnostics software.

Faults from sensors, actuators, electronic components, and engine systems are detected by the ECM and sent to the EST as Diagnostic Trouble Codes (DTCs). DTCs are necessary for correct diagnostic procedures.
